body.p: It is ordered that private Saml. B. of 13th Ky mounted Infantry to dismissed the service of the State of Kentucky he being a minor and having enlisted without the consent of his parents, he now having been mustered into the United States service.

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols

Septr. 19" 3.
Robt B. Hereford
Jamestown Ky
Sir
Herwith I send you an order discharging your son from the 13" Ky mounted Infantry. you will proceed immediately to the Camp at Lebanon and obtain your Sons. release

Yours Respy
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
By Chas Haydon. Clerk
